artifacts.description: Manage test output, such as logs, videos, and screenshots.

cleanup.description: Whether to remove all contents of artifacts directory

download.description: Settings related to downloading test artifacts from Sauce Labs.

match.description: Specifies which artifacts to download based on whether they match the file pattern provided. Supports the wildcard character '*'.

when.description: Specifies when and under what circumstances to download artifacts.

directory.description: Specifies the path to the folder in which to download artifacts. A separate subdirectory is generated in this location for each suite.
